remarks: A nonzero vector doesn't belong to the orthocomplement of its singleton.  (Contributed by NM, 27-Oct-2014.)
statement:
dochnel.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
dochnel.o $e |- ._|_ = ( ( ocH ` K ) ` W ) $.
dochnel.u $e |- U = ( ( DVecH ` K ) ` W ) $.
dochnel.v $e |- V = ( Base ` U ) $.
dochnel.z $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` U ) $.
dochnel.k $e |- ( ph -> ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) ) $.
dochnel.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. ( V \ { .0. } ) ) $.
dochnel $p |- ( ph -> -. X e. ( ._|_ ` { X } ) ) $.
